reviews.review: This will allways be the one and only for me. This is the legacy of counterstrike continued. Everything afther this, (CS GO). Never made it up to the true orgins of fast paced counterstrike. I will never forget the countless hours (acctualy belive it is around 7k). With competative gaming in the top norwegian css comunity. This game has meant a lot for me, socialy, language learning, leadership, it has also made me appriciate strategical thinking, logics and boosted my reflexes. I never went pro. But I was close!
Самая афигенная игра... в которую будут играть ещё веками:P
Can only get better. Oh! It did! Kewl!
До кала это была любимейшая игра школьников.

kill terrorists, or swat, and have fun times, 
its a fun multiplayer game
Indispensável para qualquer fã de Counter-Strike
Bitchin Game, Awesome Mods, Plenty of servers and Gamemodes, All-around-Good game, BUY IT NOW!!!!
Really good if you like FPS
Super jeu multijoueur, que dire de plus...
cu de rola, esse jogo é supimpa
Como lo dice el 1º juego en linea, El juego tiene una gran variedad de Mods, ya sean; Zombie Barricade, Zombie Escape, Fun Maps, Etc... Recomiendo este juego y mas si lo juegas con amigos.
If you like hostages and just random shooting this game is for you :D
I spent a year of my life going to a internet cafe just to play this game...so much money spent...so much fun had! =D
One of the grandfathers of FPS, buy it!

Summary:
This is one of the best Online Shooter games of all times for hardcore and social laid back gamers. There are many servers to play on, so you'll never have a hard time looking for a server to play on. Most people in this game are very Social and outgoing, and as well the zombie mod servers are indeed very fun. You will meet very interesting people on this game, and overall its a buy.
SO WHAT ARE U WAITING FOR!~

Pros:
-Lots of servers to play on and a good pllayer base system
-Fun for hardcore FPS fans and Social gamers
-Lots of Differnt mods for this game inculding Zombie mod servers
-Source engine, its nice and smooth and you dont need a Top of the line computer to play this and have fun

Cons:
-Most servers that have alot of players on are hard to get into unless you donate
-Latency Lag (depending on the server and what connection you have)
-Some Social gamming issues can cause problems Example: ( Cussing out an Admin, will get you kicked)
Great Fps. If your looking for a budget game thats fun and has a pretty active online community. Boom!headshot!!!!!!!111
best game ever, everyone should play !
The best FPS game since 2004! Now with Zombie mode, this game is even more fun than the normal mode
Play some CSS against me... pffft yeah right
CSS. You either got it or you don't.
Великая супер игра для перестрелок.Всем рекомендую кто любит КС ! =)
比起CS來說畫面加強許多，人物也較精緻，遊玩人數同樣不少
Best FPS for pc! Enough said.
They took  one of the best shooter games ever and made it prettier.
Yeah I played it for a bit
Ever wonder why it's still up there on the player charts? No? Buy it and find out. It's that good.

This game is a gem in the world of FPS. I find it to be the best version of Counter Strike and wish there was more community instead of everyone leaving to CSGO. I myself also am a server owner for CSS and say it's the best CS game ever!
I've spent way too much time with this game. It's definitely a trailblazer in it's genre.
One of the best source games ever!!!!!
WHY IS IT SO HARD TO KILL DAMMIT????
I like this game very much

Meh game, but not too bad.

Honestly dont see why so many people play it.
Probably the best shooter ever. Not much to say about the game other than it´s almost perfect and still lots of fun to play in 2021.

Incredibly fun FPS. 
It can have a steep learning curve when you are used to Call of Duty but stick with it and you'll find yourself loving it.
Well worth a buy

Despite it and its predecessors ages, they're the most popular games on Steam -  with good reason. Beautifully designed multiplayer FPS - maps and weapons with both variety and balance = perfect. Makes you wonder how anyone can  possibly enjoy weak console shit like MW2.

Pas la peine de présenter Counter-Strike, la license vendue par millions d'exemplaires.
On est ici face à un FPS solide, qui saura vous tenir en haleine.
Très différent de 1.6 et de GO, on y retrouve un gameplay à la même base, mais à la saveur différente.
Je ne peux que vous le conseiller !

CSS = Loads of fun...
Sure its an old ass game, but its been upgraded.. The graphics arent that great, but its still a fun game :)

Ein geniales Spiel, welches einen echt fesselt!

CS:S, was ist das?
CS Source ist der würdige Nachfolger vom berühmten CS 1.6.
Ein Spiel, dass die ESporter und Hobby-Terroristen auf der ganzen Welt gleichermaßen fesselt.

Es besticht durch seine Einfacheit und das geforderte Taktische-Zusammenspiel.

Ist das ein Kaufgrund?
Mehrere Millionen verkaufte Kopien, sagen Ja!
Bardzo dobra gra. Przy zgranym zespole można na prawdę wiele zdziałać. Dużo graczy, dużo modyfikacji. Współpraca to to o co chodzi w tej grze.
lol i do it for the achievment!
In my country counter strike plays you

This game is the king of all FPS.  This game taught me the importance of headshots, and with many hours, how to master them.  The massive amount of player made maps cause this game to have an unlimited amount of playing hours!
I've played every game, and I still come back to this masterpiece.
God came down from the heavens and said "LET THERE BE COUNTER-STRIKE!"

One of my top 10 games by far, spent many hours playing ze_ and much more.
If it wasn't because of the talented modders out there this game would have died years ago.
Give it a go!

Do I really need to say any praise for this game? Counter Strike 1.6 and Source have lasted for years and still has new people picking this game up. Just don't go into this thinking it's easy like Call of duty MW because it's not, it's not a noob freindly game so if you do pick this or 1.6/Counter Strike classic up then be prepared to get killed alot and really taking the time to learn how to play. But believe me it's worth it.

私をSteamに誘ったきっかけとなった感慨深いFPS。テロリストとカウンターテロリストの2チームに分かれ、様々なマップで爆破や人質救出などを行うのだが、ユーザーメイドの様々なマップやモデル、スクリプトによりもはや別ゲーともいえるサーバーまで作れる非常にユーザーフレンドリーな設計。だったのだが、大規模なアップデートにより動かなくなるスクリプトが多数発生し、それは今でも続いている。お気に入りのネタサーバーが無くなった時の虚しさは大好きなおもちゃを取り上げられた子供の気持ちにも似ている。何とかしてほしいものだ。

Foi uma evolução merecida nesse tão famoso game. E tudo continua bom como era. Se tem dúvidas em comprar só pelo gráfico, tente comprar em um pacote juntamente como 1.6 tradicional, assim você lucra no combo.
Não sei como anda o CSGO ainda, mas este aqui ainda é uma ótima pedida.
